actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution disapproving the proposed sale to Egypt of C-130 aircraft and related support equipment.

summary.text: Objects to the proposed sale to the Arab Republic of Egypt of C-130 aircraft (including spare parts, ground support equipment, training, and ancillary support), as described in transmittal number 76-74. Provides that this concurrent resolution shall become void upon a certification by the President to the Congress that the Arab Republic of Egypt has stated that a state of war no longer exists between it and the State of Israel.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution disapproving the proposed sale to Egypt of C-130 aircraft and related support equipment.
